metadata.title: CVE-2015-5266 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The enrol_meta_sync function in enrol/meta/locallib.php in Moodle through2.6.11, 2.7.x before 2.7.10, 2.8.x before 2.8.8, and 2.9.x before 2.9.2allows remote authenticated users to obtain manager privileges inopportunistic circumstances by leveraging incorrect role processing duringa long-running sync script.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
